Package data

Class Serializer<T>

java.lang.Object
data.Serializer<T>
public class Serializer<T>
extends java.lang.Object
Class contains methods for serializing and deserializing objects from files, it has a parameter T, the Class from which objects are going to be serialized/deserialized

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor Description
    Serializer()  

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    java.util.List<T> deserialize​(java.lang.String file)
    method to deserialize objects
    java.util.Map<Order,​java.util.ArrayList<MenuItem>> deserializeOrders​(java.lang.String file)
    a special method to deserialize the orders, which where serialized as a map of Order and ArrayList
    void serialize​(java.util.List<T> entries, java.lang.String file)
    method to serialized objects
    void serializeOrders​(java.util.Map<Order,​java.util.ArrayList<MenuItem>> map, java.lang.String file)
    a special function to serialize the orders which are stored in a map (does not depend of on the parameter T)

  • Method Details

    • serialize

      public void serialize​(java.util.List<T> entries, java.lang.String file)
      method to serialized objects
      Parameters:
      entries - the list of objects going to be serialized
      file - the name of the file in which to serialize the objects

    • deserialize

      public java.util.List<T> deserialize​(java.lang.String file)
      method to deserialize objects
      Parameters:
      file - the name of the file from which to deserialize the objects
      Returns:
      the deserialized list of objects

    • serializeOrders

      public void serializeOrders​(java.util.Map<Order,​java.util.ArrayList<MenuItem>> map, java.lang.String file)
      a special function to serialize the orders which are stored in a map (does not depend of on the parameter T)
      Parameters:
      map - a map of Order and ArrayList to be serialized
      file - the file in which to serialize the objects

    • deserializeOrders

      public java.util.Map<Order,​java.util.ArrayList<MenuItem>> deserializeOrders​(java.lang.String file)
      a special method to deserialize the orders, which where serialized as a map of Order and ArrayList
      Parameters:
      file - the file from which to deserialize the map of orders
      Returns:
      the map of orders
